name: Lauren Jones Footwear
tag_list: lauren-jones-footwear, lauren-jones-shoes, lauren-jones-shoe, belk, nordstrom-com, laurenjonescollection, lauren-jones-collection
overview:
The Lauren Jones Footwear line is known for its focus on femininity, fashion forward trends, and cost-efficient price points.

In regards to the Lauren Jones brand, Jones is currently the Co-Founder and CFO of the nationally recognized, and rapidly expanding, brand and shoe line Lauren Jones. The first shoe collection hit runways October 2009 at the WeddingChannel Couture Show in New York City. Lauren Jones Footwear arrived in New York City showrooms December 3 and 4, 2009, in the Titan Showroom. Lauren Jones Footwear subsequently became a division of Titan Industries Inc., which also carries other well known brands such as Bebe, Badgley Mischka and Betsey Johnson.

The first Lauren Jones shoe lines featured fashion forward bridal looks with subsequent lines offering special occasion and evening footwear. Lauren Jones shoes now encompass bridal, special occasion, red carpet event, day wear and trends such as over the knee boots. Lauren Jones Shoes are available through major retailers such as Belk, Nordstrom.com, Zappos.com, Alfred Angelo and Endless.com beginning February 15, 2010.

Jones currently makes Martinez Valero shoes available for purchase at her online store, LaurenJonesCollection.comLauren Jones Collection.

In addition to Lauren Jones Shoes, Jones is also developing an accessories and swimwear line.

Lauren Jones Footwear Biography:

Exquisitely embellished with innovative hardware, luxurious satins, colorful fabrics, and trim from around the world, the 2010 shoes range from fun and flirty to chic, and sophisticated to seriously sultry, much like the women who wear them. And weâ€™ve added some traditional shoes to the mix as well. We have something for everyone, and our focus is our gorgeous bride.

From pumps to platforms, Lauren Jones Footwear features oh-so exciting colors and paparazzi worthy embellishments. Like our shoes, we know that every woman is unique.

Whatever shoe you select, every Lauren Jones design celebrates your femininity, confidence and fashion-forward sense of style. No matter how crowded the cathedral or beach front celebration, youâ€™ll stand out.

While turning plenty of heads on your big day, our shoes have also been capturing the attention of the media and press. Lauren Jones Footwear has even been featured on the runway at the Wedding Channel Couture Fashion show in New York City this past October 19th, 2009.

Lauren Jones Footwear 2010 is building excitement and national recognition so go ahead, try us on â€” if you havenâ€™t already. Weâ€™re pretty sure youâ€™ll agree: Itâ€™s Lauren Jones Collection for your bridal needs, or nothing at all.

All about Lauren Jones and Lauren Jones Footwear, the Name Behind the Brand:

Lauren Jones footwear defines the fashion forward, glamorous, sassy and savvy girly girl. The collections are fashionable, sexy, on trend, and always inspire, stand out, and make a statement.

Lauren Jonesâ€™ career continues to enthuse and amuse! Her outgoing and charismatic personality both on and off camera motivates fans to look to her as a fashion leader. Lauren Jones footwear collections are inspired by her lifestyle and the love of all things girly, glam, luxurious, and of course, fabulous red carpet fashion! The collections deliver on-trend, high quality designs, exquisitely embellished with innovative hardware, luxurious satins, colorful fabrics, and trim from around the world. Lauren Jones Footwear celebrates sexy and glamorous style.

Sassy, trendy, edgy and exciting, Lauren Jones Footwear makes going out, or anywhere for that matter, so much fun! Whether heading to parties, celebrations, weddings or red carpet events, Lauren Jones Footwear is fit to flatter! Lauren Jones Shoes range from fun and flirty to chic, and sophisticated to seriously sultry, much like the women who wear them.
